exceptions.tactic: apply (refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot' rri net gd d d' Hreboot Hp Hreach).
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface orig_base_params', one_node_params' : network raft_params' : GhostSimulations.ghost_data rri' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output net : Net.name gd : raft_data d : reboot rri' = gd d' : cronies_term orig_base_params' Hreboot : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable orig_base_params' Hnet : nwState orig_base_params' net = (raft_params', rri') Hreach : forall h' : Net.name, nwState one_node_params' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState orig_base_params') net (raft_params', gd) h' Hstate : nwPackets orig_base_params' = nwPackets one_node_params' Hst' : name Hp : Net.name Hpackets : term The term "rri" has type "raft_refinement_interface" while it is expected to have type "network -> Prop".

ctx: intros orig_base_params' one_node_params' raft_params' rri' net gd d d' Hreboot Hnet Hreach Hstate Hst' Hp Hpackets.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface orig_base_params', one_node_params' : network raft_params' : GhostSimulations.ghost_data rri' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output net : Net.name gd : raft_data d : reboot rri' = gd d' : cronies_term orig_base_params' Hreboot : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable orig_base_params' Hnet : nwState orig_base_params' net = (raft_params', rri') Hreach : forall h' : Net.name, nwState one_node_params' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState orig_base_params') net (raft_params', gd) h' Hstate : nwPackets orig_base_params' = nwPackets one_node_params' Hst' : name Hp : Net.name Hpackets : term h' : In Hst' (cronies (fst (nwState one_node_params' Hp)) Hpackets) Unable to unify "name" with "Hpackets <= currentTerm (snd (nwState one_node_params' Hp))".

original: intros orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params rri net gd d d' Hreboot Hnet Hreach Hstate Hst' Hp Hpackets. apply (refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot' rri net gd d d' Hreboot Hp Hreach). - auto. - auto. - intros h'. apply Hst'. - auto. - reflexivity.
